feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-15T00:30:03.999700Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;GPT-4 的原生 JSON 输出</stitle>; <id>;https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt-4</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T19:29:39.864524Z</更新>; <link href="https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt-4"/>; <author>; <name>;yonom</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yonom</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fbcf4d45c- 57cd-4dca-b2d3-2f173af25df0_1600x1024.png" style="width: 220px; height: 141px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在集成 LLM（大型语言模型）中使用函数调用来生成 JSON 等结构化数据。这一新功能简化了流程，并允许从 GPT 调用中获得更可靠的 JSON 响应. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#native-json-output-from-gpt-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gorilla：与 API 连接的大型语言模型</stitle>; <id>;https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-14T22:29:39.865134Z</updated>; <link href="https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/"/>; <author>; <name>;throwaway888abc</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=throwaway888abc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/assets/img/gorilla_method. png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 137px;" />;<br />;Gorilla 是一种微调的大型语言模型 (LLM)，在生成准确的 API 调用和减轻幻觉问题方面优于 GPT-4。它展示了 LLM 通过 API 调用和有效使用工具的潜力适应测试时文档更改。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gorilla-large-language-model-connected-with-apis" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333290" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科学家在土卫二上发现磷</stitle>; <id>;https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/scientists -discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T23:29:39.865625Z</更新>; <link href="https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/scientists- discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://tlpnetwork.com/images/logo-main.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;科学家们在土星的卫星土卫二上发现了生命必需元素磷。这一发现基于美国宇航局卡西尼任务收集的数据，表明土卫二可能具有支持生命存在的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36333762" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;使用核心 Vim 动作快速移动</stitle>; <id>;https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu-with-vscode-and-vim /moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T21:29:39.866098Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.barbarianmeetscoding .com/boost-your-coding-fu-with-vscode-and-vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/"/>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/images/ vim-motions-word.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;Vim 中的动作是允许快速和精确移动光标的命令。有不同类型的动作，例如单词动作和类似搜索的动作，每种动作适用于不同的目的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moving-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我在 21 小时内启动了 Linux 293k 次</stitle>; <id>;https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted- linux-292612-times/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T14:29:39.866563Z</更新>; <link href="https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i- booted-linux-292612-times/"/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;而且只用了 21 个小时。Linux 6.4 有一个错误，它在启动时挂起，但可能只有千分之一的启动（如果出于某种原因使用 Intel 硬件，则更少）。令人惊讶对我来说，没有人注意到这一点，但我确实注意到了，因为我们使用 libguestfs 的 nbdkit 测试是随机的…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-booted-linux-293k-times-in -21 小时" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36325986" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU——比较可用容量GPU 云提供商</stitle>; <id>;https://llm-utils.org/Nvidia+H100+and+A100+GPUs+-+comparing+available+capacity+at+GPU+cloud+providers</id>; <updated >;2023-06-14T22:29:39.867020Z</updated>; <link href="https://llm-utils.org/Nvidia+H100+and+A100+GPUs+-+comparing+available+capacity+at+GPU +cloud+providers"/>; <author>; <name>;tikkun</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tikkun</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU - 比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量 - LLM Utils <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nvidia-h100-and-a100-gpus-comparing-available-capacity- at-gpu-cloud-providers" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333321" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我可能是唯一的邪恶（ bit) 互联网用户 (2015)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.benjojo.co.uk/post/evil-bit-RFC3514-real-world-usage</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-14T18:29:39.867482Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.benjojo.co.uk/post/evil-bit-RFC3514-real-world-usage"/>; <作者>; <名称>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章讨论了笑话 RFC 的概念在愚人节制作并突出显示 RFC3514，它在 IPv4 标头中引入了“邪恶位”。笔者探究是否真的有人设置了evil bit，发现有些网站会屏蔽设置了evil bit的数据包。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-may-be-the-only-evil-bit-user-on-the-internet-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330116" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AMD openSIL 开源固件概念验证</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/openSIL/ openSIL</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:29:39.867838Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/openSIL/openSIL"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wmf</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wmf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com /44ab2099943d717b49b07c5a21eb0be9e6f8f25f6d884fbaed026e74f454c91b/openSIL/openSIL" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此提交不属于此存储库上的任何分支，并且可能属于存储库外部的分支。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amd-opensil-open-source-firmware-proof-of-concept" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36331394" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我是急诊医生。这是我已经在使用 ChatGPT 帮助治疗患者的方式</stitle>; <id>;https://inflethealth.medium.com/im-an-er-doctor-here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt -to-help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:29:39.868215Z</更新>; <link href="https://inflecthealth.medium.com/im-an- er-doctor-here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6"/>; <author>; <name>;SLHamlet</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=SLHamlet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1053/1* zVkc5iNVMQQIApQS_OKAAA.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;人工智能，特别是 ChatGPT，有可能改变医疗保健，但它的直接影响在于较小的应用程序。例如，一名急诊医生一直在使用 ChatGPT 与患者及其家属进行有效沟通，提供清晰的解释并缓解他们的顾虑。这改善了医患关系，并使医疗专业人员能够专注于提供优质护理。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#im-an-er-doctor-heres-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36332999" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用设备电源 LED 的视频片段从设备中恢复密钥</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.nassiben.com/video-based-crypta</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:29:39.868578Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nassiben.com/video -based-crypta"/>; <author>; <name>;jedisct1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jedisct1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a53494_34b76e649d0d4b8180617a88c0553ecb~mv2.jpeg/v1/fill/w_211,h_189,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/a534 94_34b76e649d0d4b8180617a88c0553ecb~mv2 .jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：198px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了基于视频的密码分析，这是一种新方法，允许攻击者通过分析设备电源 LED 的视频片段从设备中恢复密钥。通过利用设备功耗与电源 LED 亮度之间的相关性，攻击者可以使用商用摄像机来提高采样率并恢复密钥。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#recovering-secret-keys-from-devices-using-video-footage-of-their-power-led" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36331446" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;被困在卡车下</stitle>; <id>;https://www.propublica.org/article/underride-crashes -nhtsa-dot-iihs-safety-cars-trucks</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:29:39.868926Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.propublica.org/article/ underride-crashes-nhtsa-dot-iihs-safety-cars-trucks"/>; <作者>; <name>;danso</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danso</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20230613-KillerTrucks_Crash.JPG?crop=focalpoint&fit=crop&fm=webp&fp- x=0.5&fp-y=0.5&h=534&q=75&w=800&s=4ac007fa7a1ab5b8b545a546a21b279e" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;联邦安全监管机构忽视了科学研究，未能采取行动防止涉及重型卡车的致命撞车事故。小型车辆从大型商用卡车下方滑过的撞车事故很常见，每年导致数百人死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trapped-under-trucks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36332086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;纽约州参议院通过竞业禁止令</stitle>; <id>;https://ogletree.com/insights/new-york-state-senate-passes-prohibitions-on-non-竞争/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T18:29:39.869272Z</更新>; <link href="https://ogletree.com/insights/new-york-state-senate-passes-prohibitions- on-non-competes/"/>; <author>; <name>;hhs</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hhs</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://ogletree.com/app/uploads/Insights/state-development/new-york.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：111px；" />;<br />;随着纽约州参议院批准两项提议禁止所有竞业禁止协议和有限禁止某些竞业禁止协议的法案，纽约州关于竞业禁止协议的法律即将发生重大变化。这些法案正在纽约州议会审议中，如果获得通过，将被送交州长 Kathy Hochul 批准。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-york-state-senate-passes-prohibitions-on-non-competes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36329483" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;程序员对 CPU 缓存的误解</stitle>; <id>;https://software.rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/myths- programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:29:39.869616Z</更新>; <link href="https://software.rajivprab.com/2018/04/ 29/myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/"/>; <作者>; <name>;whack</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whack</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://softwarerajivprab.files.wordpress.com/2019/07/cache.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：259px；" />;<br />;作为一名在 Intel 和 Sun 从事高速缓存工作五年的计算机工程师，我对高速缓存一致性了解了一两件事。这是大学时最难学的概念之一——但一旦你真正理解了它，它就会让你对系统设计原则产生深刻的认识。你…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333034" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;总是相同的警告标志</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/blog-post/always-same-warning-signs </id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T13:29:39.869960Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/blog-post/always-same-warning-signs" />; <author>; <name>;rossdavidh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rossdavidh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://www.science.org/pb-assets/images/blogs/pipeline/dlowe-1620403293.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;位于波士顿/剑桥地区的一家生物技术公司 Laronde 在复制数据方面面临重大问题，这些数据帮助他们筹集了数亿美元。该公司在循环 mRNA 技术方面取得了可喜的成果，但没有其他人可以复制它，实验室负责人拒绝分享原始数据。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#always-the-same-warning-signs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36325349" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;将教育委托给记者的危险 (2012)</stitle>; <id>;https://radicalscholarship.com/2014/11/03/guest-post-the-danger- of-delegating-education-to-journalists-k-anders-ericsson/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:29:39.870306Z</更新>; <link href="https://radicalscholarship.com/ 2014/11/03/guest-post-the-danger-of-delegating-education-to-journalists-k-anders-ericsson/"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://radicalscholarship.files.wordpress.com/2023/02/cropped -litcon23-book-signing.jpeg?w=200" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了在流行文章中准确表示研究的重要性，并批评了一篇特定文章中关于专家表现和刻意练习的误导性陈述。它还强调了对信息丰富且准确反映专家观点的研究摘要的需求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-danger-of-delegating-education-to-journalists-2012" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;维修电子产品：循环经济解决方案</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /nextbillion.net/repairing-electronics-circular-economy-solution-ewaste-rural-africa/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T19:29:39.870673Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /nextbillion.net/repairing-electronics-circular-economy-solution-ewaste-rural-africa/"/>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nextbillion.net/wp-content/uploads/erlend-ekseth-0a5VbkqqFFE-unsplash-copy-150x150。 jpg" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 220px;" />;<br />;赞比亚的 SolarAid 在农村地区开展了一项太阳能灯回收计划，以延长太阳能灯的使用寿命。他们聘请了当地的技术人员，并推出了一款移动应用程序来帮助修复太阳能灯，赋予它们第二次生命，并提供更长时间的清洁照明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#repairing-electronics-a-circular-economy-solution" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316848" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;长尾去哪儿了？ (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.honest-broker.com/p/where-did-the-long-tail-go</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:29： 39.871017Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.honest-broker.com/p/where-did-the-long-tail-go"/>; <author>; <name>;nickwritesit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch /w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F251717c1-623d-45 34-a8c6 -e0aae4488dd6_900x512.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了反文化的衰落及其与长尾概念的联系。它争辩说，本应振兴文化并支持不同声音的长尾理论从未兑现其承诺。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#where-did-the-long-tail-go-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310967" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;How to implement dependent type theory I (2012)</stitle>; <id>;https://math.andrej.com/2012/11/08/how- to-implement-dependent-type-theory-i/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:29:39.871363Z</更新>; <link href="https://math.andrej.com/2012/ 11/08/how-to-implement-dependent-type-theory-i/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了具有不可判定类型检查的依赖类型理论的实现。作者展示了一个最小的原型，并解释了实现类型推断、规范化和其他辅助功能的过程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-implement-dependent-type-theory-i-2012" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36321361" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;第一批感染 Covid-19 的人是 WIV 的科学家：美国政府消息来源</stitle>; <id>;https://public.substack.com/p /first-people-sickened-by-covid-19</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T17:29:39.871708Z</updated>; <link href="https://public.substack.com/p/ first-people-sickened-by-covid-19"/>; <author>; <name>;larsiusprime</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=larsiusprime</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post- media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffc95afa5-03b2-441d-be51-b252465caa8f_2514x1742.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：153px；" />;<br />;这篇文章提出了新的证据，表明 SARS-CoV-2 病毒可能是从武汉病毒研究所意外泄漏的。它表明，第一批感染该病毒的人是该研究所的研究人员，其中包括领导 SARS 样冠状病毒研究的胡本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#first-people-sickened-by-covid-19-were-scientists-at-wiv-us-government-sources" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36328352" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;The Overhang Problem (2007) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://math.dartmouth .edu/~pw/papers/maxover.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T21:29:39.872076Z</更新>; <link href="https://math.dartmouth.edu/~pw/ papers/maxover.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;f5ve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=f5ve</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;文章讨论了悬垂问题，即一堆相同的块可以悬在桌子边缘多远的问题。以前认为最大悬垂量级为 log n，但最近的研究表明它实际上可以达到 n1/3 量级。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-overhang-problem-2007-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36332136" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;为什么核电站建设成本如此之高？</stitle>; <id>;https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-construction-costs/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:29:39.872413Z</更新>; <link href="https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-construction-costs/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;镰刀</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scythe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://progress.institute /wp-content/uploads/image-12.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：162px；" />;<br />;随着技术的进步，核电站建设成本一直在增加。高成本主要是由于人工费用、监管增加以及需要能够在受损工厂中运行的冷却系统等因素造成的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-does-nuclear-power-plant-construction-cost-so-much" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Credal.ai (YC W23) – 企业 AI 的数据安全</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36326525</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T16:29:39.872759Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525"/ >; <author>; <name>;r_thambapillai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=r_thambapillai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Credal.ai 提供一个聊天 UI 和 API，为使用语言模型及其公司数据的公司实施数据安全措施。它们解决了与数据控制、可见性和访问控制相关的安全和隐私障碍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-credal-ai-yc-w23-data-safety-for-enterprise-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Freaky Leaky SMS：通过分析 SMS 时间提取用户位置</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs /2306.07695</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T16:29:39.873110Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.07695"/>; <author>; <name>;belter< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv. org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;标题为“Freaky Leaky SMS：通过分析 SMS 时间提取用户位置”的文章讨论了接收静默 SMS 消息如何创建允许其他人确定收件人位置的旁路。通过分析计时测量，攻击者可以准确地确定接收者的位置。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#freaky-leaky-sms-extracting-user-locations-by-analyzing-sms-timings" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36328245" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Phoenix LiveView：异步分配模式</stitle>; <id>;http://blog.andyglassman.com/2023/06/phoenix- liveview-async-assign-pattern.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T19:29:39.873444Z</更新>; <link href="http://blog.andyglassman.com/2023/06/phoenix -liveview-async-assign-pattern.html"/>; <author>; <name>;gnutrino</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gnutrino</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEhK49xMjyducCjCYo72GKZ66nEHpEPpeqi_CJyTHThkTU10NB0O-OzPX0SqW0qwW0r2OGs4k0PoFBWVY2eu-PTC5wE BcPx6GRe9wg5qHLcOMKCJO8bAtPQvyHSjGGOtSBzyaYY7wcUuojaHP9dZPBNWyR8mcSyTRwpCrEEoJ-J2Zk59d7PeK4Akag/s320/trains.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了如何使用 sentry-elixir 向 Elixir 代码库中的 Sentry 报告事件。它还解释了自定义指纹的概念，以对 Sentry 中的相关问题进行分组。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#phoenix-liveview-async-assign-pattern" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36330541" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;编写 Linux 调试器（2017）</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.tartanllama.xyz/writing-a-linux-debugger-setup/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -14T17:29:39.873779Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.tartanllama.xyz/writing-a-linux-debugger-setup/"/>; <author>; <name>;lrsjng</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lrsjng</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了调试器对开发人员的重要性以及可用资源的缺乏如何编写一个。然后，作者介绍了一个教程系列，介绍如何编写用于调试 Linux 程序的调试器，重点是 C 和 C++ 语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#writing-a-linux-debugger-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36317385" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;滚动条的演变</stitle>; <id>;https://scrollbars.matoseb.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T23:29:39.874117Z< /updated>; <link href="https://scrollbars.matoseb.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;promiseofbeans</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=promiseofbeans </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Matoseb/Scrollbars/master/rsrc/screenshot_01.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：153px；" />;<br />;尽可能忠实地重新创建了一些标志性的滚动条。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#evolution-of-the-scrollbar" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36307341" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;湾区女性正在努力证明 Yelp 评论不可信</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sfgate.com/tech/article/yel-review- fraud-kay-dean-18150617.php</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T17:29:39.874457Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sfgate.com/tech/article/yel -review-fraud-kay-dean-18150617.php"/>; <author>; <name>;gnicholas</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gnicholas</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.hdnux.com/photos/01/33/23/01/23933032/3/ratio1x1_100.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：221px；" />;<br />;一位名叫迪恩的湾区女性一直在反对 Yelp 和在线评论生态系统。她发现了虚假评论和欺诈行为，记录了她的发现并揭露了 Yelp 和谷歌等平台缺乏可信度。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bay-area-woman-is-on-a-crusade-to-prove-yelp-reviews-cant-be-trusted" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36328433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Attention is Turing complete (2021) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.jmlr.org/papers/volume22/20-302/20-302.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:29:39.874801Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .jmlr.org/papers/volume22/20-302/20-302.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;Anon84</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Anon84 </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了 Transformer 架构的计算能力，特别是它计算和访问内部密集数据表示的能力。该研究表明，具有硬注意力的 Transformer 是图灵完备的，并确定了该完整性结果所需的最少元素。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#attention-is-turing-complete-2021-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36332033" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TypeCell，开源 TypeScript 笔记本实时编程环境</stitle>;
